span.span: during our Extended School Closure.Additionalresourcesare also providedto support your childs learning.We appreciate that this is an ongoing educational learning plan, and while we cannot replicate the classroom learning experience, we continue to design meaningful, targeted weekly learning opportunitiesfor our students.
